name: Adjacent Ally or Self
description: Targets self or an adjacent ally.

name: All Pokemon
description: Affects all Pokemon on the field.

name: All Adjacent
description: Hits all adjacent Pokemon (allies and foes).

name: Allies
description: Affects all allies on the field.

name: Ally Side
description: Affects the user's side of the field.

name: Any Pokemon
description: Can target any Pokemon on the field.

name: Foe Side
description: Affects the opponent's side of the field.

name: Scripted
description: Target determined by move's specific effect.
